title: Hanging, "Fire, Earth, Sky and Water", 1972–73
medium:
Medium: wool, cotton, bast
Technique: twill fret derivation
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 68.6 x 48.3 cm (27 x 19 in.)
description: Four narrow bands are above the other representing Fire, Earth, Sky and Water. Ivory wool warp, 3 bands of black weft and one of maroon. Narrow red cotton stripe in edges and narrow bnad of natural buff plain weave at top and bottom. 2.75 inch warp fringe at top and bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hanging, "Fire, Earth, Sky and Water", 1972–73.
1972–73. Medium: wool, cotton, bast
Technique: twill fret derivation. Gift of Friends of Textiles. 1974-75-1.
